images.description: Bug types are often based on insects and are known as the weaking type in the game.
Dark types were added to counter Psychic dominance and have more sinister moves.
Dragon types are typically powerful with high base stats and the type of most legendaries.
Electric types are known for having some of the highest speed stats.
Fairy types were introduced to balance Dragon types and often have healing moves and high Special Attack.
Fighting types excel at physical attacks and counter Normal and Rock types.
Fire types are strong against Grass and Ice and often learn some of the most powerful special moves.
Flying types are most commonly paired as a secondary type and are immune to Ground.
Ghost types are immune to Normal and Fighting and commonly have eerie, spectral designs.
Grass types often use status and healing moves but commonly have many weaknesses.
Ground types also known for their high offence they are also known for the common move earthquake being a competitive staple.
Ice types are powerful offensively but suffer from several common weaknesses making them the glass cannon of the games.
Normal types are known for thier diversity to make up for their lackluster typing.
Poison types often inflict status effects to make up for their lacking offenses.
Psychic types used be be know as one of the strongest types in the game until the game was further balanced..
Rock types are known for their balance between offence and defence but their moves having low accuracy.
Steel types have many resistances and are known for their high defence.
Water types are the most common type having the largest amount of pokemon for.
